Text: I began watching this and everything seemed to be working fine, and then when the characters came on the screen there was no audio for their dialogue, however there was a music track playing.  Is there something i can do to hear their voices?

Video: Xvid 720x304 23.98fps ~1000Kbps
Audio: Dolby AC3 48000Hz 6ch 448Kbps
CD1: 01h 07m 01s
CD2: 01h 09m 31s

Thank you!
It works great. As well as quality.

@RageKage214

Although i didn't download this one to confirm your issue, your speaker configurations may be configured incorrectly. You may not be hearing center speakers output for some reason. Try playing the movie with audio downmixed to stereo.
Oh my. 2 years have passed. I suppose you may not be even using same device to watch movies anymore lol
